column8: After splitting from the hugely successful Walker Brothers in 1967 Scott Walker strived to find a new musical maturity by recording the risque songs of Jacques Brel and exploring European musical roots. A huge star in Japan and Europe his early solo albums were solid sellers and he even has his own BBC TV show in 1969 performing ballads, big band numbers all in is own unique style. He recently collaborated with Bat for Lashes on her second album "wo Suns". Proof if it was needed that he`s still swinging.
column21: After splitting from the hugely successful Walker Brothers in 1967 Scott Walker strived to find a new musical maturity by recording the risque songs of Jacques Brel and exploring European musical roots. Admire him, wear our Scott Walker t shirt.
